sentences.sContent: US officials said they would, "press vigorously for redress".
sentences.sContent_eng: US officials said they would, "press vigorously for redress".
sentences.sCn: 美国官员说他们会“使劲压以达到矫正的效果”。

synos.tran: 救济；赔偿；纠正；重新调整

phrases.pCn: 要求赔偿；寻求解决办法

remMethod.val: re(重新) + dress(穿衣； 整理) → 重新整理 → 矫正， 修正
